body_html: I'm working with Ryan on this. We have it working utilizing the Eigen implementation of arg and are currently in the process of writing tests for it. We haven't been able to test it on a GPU enabled device but will likely be able to do that soon as well, should we wait until we do that to submit a pull request? Also, we were curious if we should include the code we created for implementing arctan through Eigen before we knew that Eigen had a method for computing the argument directly.

body: I'm working with Ryan on this. We have it working utilizing the Eigen implementation of arg and are currently in the process of writing tests for it. We haven't been able to test it on a GPU enabled device but will likely be able to do that soon as well, should we wait until we do that to submit a pull request? Also, we were curious if we should include the code we created for implementing arctan through Eigen before we knew that Eigen had a method for computing the argument directly.
